Gabrielle Civil bụ ónyé America na-eme ihe nkírí, onye na-ede uri, na ónyé nkuzi.

Civil sitere na Detroit, Michigan. Site na 1991 ruo 1995 ọ gàrà Mahadum nke Michigan, ébé ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nsọpụrụ dị elu na ma édémédé okike na Comparative Literature. Mgbe e mesịrị, Civil gara Mahadum New York maka nzere masta ya na nzèrè doctorate ya

ya na akwụkwọ ntụnyere n'afọ 2000. Akwụkwọ edemede ya, From Body to Nation: Reading Black Women's Poetry in the United States, Haiti & Canada, lekwasịrị anya na uri nke ụmụ nwanyị ojii na United States, Canada na Haiti
Ihe ndị Civil lekwasịrị anya gụnyere Black Feminist Theory; African-American Literature; Experimental World Poetry.
Civil malitere ọrụ nkụzi ya na-akụzi ógè okpomọkụ na Bard College, Annandale-on-Hudson, na New York

Ọ kụziri "atụmatụ maka ihe ọmụma a na-etinye n'ime" site na Language & Thinking 2002, 2004, 2005, 2006. Mgbè ógè okpomọkụ ya na Bard College gasịrị, Civil kụziri "Women and Voice: Black Women and Performance" na Macalester College site na 2005 ruo n'oge oyi nke afọ 2006.  Ọ laghachiri na Bard College, wee kụzie màkà Bard College Prison Initiative, "Language & Thinking, Eastern Maximum Security Correctional Facility," n'oge ọkọchị nke afọ 2011. Ọ kụziri na Mahadum St

Paul, Minnesota, site na 2000 ruo 2013 dị ka prọfesọ na-arụ ọrụ na Bekee, ọmụmụ ụmụ nwanyị, na Critical Studies of Race and Ethnicity. Site na 2013 ruo 2016, ọ bụ osote prọfesọ nke arụmọrụ na Antioch College na Yellow Springs, Ohio. Ọ na-akụzi ugbu a dị ka ónyé ọbịa na Jack Kerouac School of Disembodied Poetics na Mahadum Naropa na Boulder, Colorado.

Civil na-akọwa onwé ya dị ka ónyé ojii, onye na-ese ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị nke ebumnuche ya bụ "ịmeghe oghere". Ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'onwe ya na mmekorita ma gosipụta ihe karịrị 40 performances na North America na mba ofesi.
